# LLM Access Policy for Reifencheck.de
## ------------------------------------------------------------
## This file defines permissions for AI crawlers (Large Language Models)
## regarding indexing, summarization, and use of Reifencheck.de content.
## Based on emerging standards from llmcompliance.org.
## ------------------------------------------------------------

# -----------------------
# AI CRAWLER PERMISSIONS
# -----------------------

User-agent: GPTBot
Disallow: /                      ## Block OpenAI training datasets
Allow: /                         ## Allow for generative search indexing only

User-agent: ClaudeBot
Disallow: /                      ## Block Anthropic training datasets
Allow: /                         ## Allow summarization / retrieval indexing

User-agent: PerplexityBot
Allow: /                         ## Allow for search, answers, citations

User-agent: CCBot
Disallow: /                      ## Block Common Crawl data harvesting

User-agent: AmazonBot
Disallow: /                      ## Block Amazon AI data collection

User-agent: YouBot
Allow: /                         ## Allow You.com Search indexing

User-agent: Google-Extended
Allow: /                         ## Allow Gemini / SGE AI indexing (not training)

User-agent: *
Allow: /                         ## Standard web crawlers allowed

# -----------------------
# AI USAGE DIRECTIVES
# -----------------------
Training: disallow               ## ‚ùå Content MAY NOT be used to train AI models
Crawling: allow                  ## ‚úÖ Indexing allowed for search & discovery
Commercial: allow                ## ‚úÖ Reuse allowed in commercial AI search tools
Derivatives: allow               ## ‚úÖ Summaries, answers, transformations allowed
Attribution: required            ## ‚úÖ Must cite Reifencheck.de when used
Personal-Data: disallow          ## ‚ùå No AI may process or store personal data
Rate-Limit: reasonable           ## ‚ö†Ô∏è Bots must crawl responsibly

Contact: support@reifencheck.de  ## üìß Contact for data or compliance inquiries
Last-Modified: 2025-10-13

# -----------------------
# PURPOSE OF THIS POLICY
# -----------------------
## This policy controls how AI systems:
## - Crawl Reifencheck.de
## - Index and summarize public content
## - Use content in answers, citations, and search results
## - Are restricted from training foundation models on our data
